title: An Ark in the Dark: Noah's Story (The Creator's Toy Chest)
features: God created us to enjoy and learn from stories, even from a young age. The new Creator's Toy Chest series brings beloved Bible stories to life for young children with vivid illustrations, youthful characters, and rhyming text perfect for reading aloud. Kids will be thrilled to read about the creation of the world in
, the courage of a young David in
, and the integrity of Daniel in
The fun, memorable rhymes will draw readers in to the world of the Creator's Toy Chest and engage their God-shaped imagination. Illustrated by James Koenig.
description: "Yes. Yes, I say. I say it is true!God told it to me, now I'm telling you.The rain will come. I warn you all.When it does, it will fall, fall, fall."Join Noah as he ignores the doubts of others in order to remain faithful to God--and ultimately shows that God is faithful until the end.
About the Creator's Toy Chest Series

God created us to enjoy and learn from stories, even from a young age. The Creator's Toy Chest series brings beloved Bible stories to life for young children with vivid illustrations, youthful characters, and rhyming text perfect for reading aloud.
is a graduate of Yale Divinity School, a minister, an entrepreneur, and a writer. Learn more at www.brettblair.com and www.creatorstoychest.com.
served as a pastor for thirteen years before turning his attention to writing and editing Sermons.com and Pastor.com full time. A graduate of Yale Divinity School, Brett is the author of
The Big Influence of Small Things
. Brett lives in Florida with his wife, Cyndi, and their three children.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/e21e6dvvri1tk9lja6rdfib4ed._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'James Koenig', 'about': ['I have been illustrating children’s books books for over 15 years, having illustrated over 65 published books. Throughout the years, I have illustrated for publishing companies as well as independent authors. I enjoy creating colorful, fun, and imaginative illustrations for kids and adults alike. I strive to blend my creativity with emotion in each character and illustration.', 'Some of my favorite things to draw are animals, cute kids, monsters, aliens, and interesting environments. I love illustrating humorous scenes and I love drawing adorable, endearing scenes. Plus, I love trying out different illustration styles for different books.', 'I have a passion for illustrating books and I feel grateful to be able to work on so many already in my career. And I always look forward to what new books I will be illustrating in the future.', "When I'm not drawing, you can find me collecting toys & figurines, reading fantasy & scifi, or having fun as an amateur puppeteer for neighborhood kids.", 'You can learn more about me and see more of my work at www.freelancefridge.com.
